thread.section_title: NobleDEN Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable hotel in great location
thread.title_full: Comfortable hotel in great location - Review of NobleDEN Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: angieyca
title: Comfortable hotel in great location
text:
We stayed in this hotel for three nights while we're moving houses. This hotel is located at a very good location. Surrounded by all the great restaurants in Soho area, I am totally ok with the fact that they don't have a restaurant in the hotel. You can easily grab any cuisines within walking distance.
The room is spacious and clean. Staffs are all friendly and helpful.
The hotel is very close to tube stations. Plenty of bus lines go around the area. And shopping areas such as Oxford Street and Regent Street are all within walking distance.
We would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who visit London.
